name: Hover Dash
description:
Hover Dash is a two player hover kart racing game. Race around the track eating skittles to gain its color's power. The more diverse you skittle diet is the faster you will go! CONTROLLERS ARE RECOMMENDED!

Instructions:

Player 1:

Gas: W / Right Trigger

Brake: S / Left Trigger

Turn: A | D / Left Stick

Player 2:

Gas: Up arrow / Right Trigger

Brake: Down Arrow / Left Trigger

Turn: Right Arrow | Left Arrow / Left Stick

Criteria:

1-Kart Racer: Race hover cars around cloud tracks

2-Skittles: The more diverse you skittle diet the faster you go

3-Anatomically Incorrect: The karts have…. mouths?

4-Chiptune: Beep Boop

Credits:

Programming / Design / Art / Music : Street.dev 

Skybox: Boxophobic
